title: Playing with Thornton’s Books
text:
Some experiments with data created by the Alice Thornton’s Books project.
Mapping Alice Thornton’s Yorkshire

title: Mapping Alice Thornton’s Books: Yorkshire
text:
This map and linked data are early work in progress for the Alice Thornton’s Books project. The map shows places in Yorkshire that were mentioned by Alice Thornton in her Books.
Red pins mark places where Thornton lived for significant periods during her life. Hover over any pins to see a basic place name label; click/tap on red pins for extra information. The table below the map provides links to related material in a number of online resources.
To filter place names click/tap in the Find places box and select from the drop down menu (or start typing names and hit enter to autocomplete). Multiple selections are allowed.
Or click on the make a selection button in the map (just below the + and - buttons) to narrow down to a smaller area of the map.
(You can also highlight a single place by clicking on the place name in the table (click again to reset) but please note that the map will not automatically move to show the highlighted place.)







Find places
